backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining SurgeryCase data types, user profiles, and CRUD operations with access control; includes authorization mixin and permission checks for all operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: sorting control UI component, sorting logic implementation, and sort persistence across user actions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components for authentication, case management, CSV import/export, search, sorting, and validation logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with light color scheme enforcement, favicon links, and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing authentication flow, profile setup modal, and case list view; enforces light theme and prevents dark mode with MutationObserver.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Button component for Internet Identity login/logout with query cache clearing on logout and error handling for authentication state conflicts.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup requiring name input; prevents dismissal until profile is created.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Checklist configuration defining seven items with default states and utility functions for default checklist creation and filtering remaining tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Displays a surgery case as a card with patient details, checklist progress, and action buttons for editing and deleting. Handles checklist task completion and case deletion with confirmation dialogs.

Modal dialog for creating or editing surgery cases with form fields, AI-powered structured text parsing, MRN-based auto-prefill from existing cases, and checklist management. Tracks user-edited fields to avoid overwriting manual changes during auto-prefill.
Main view component that displays all surgery cases in a grid layout with search, sort, and CSV import/export controls. Shows loading state and empty state with prompts to create the first case.
Search input component with icon that filters cases by any field. Controlled component that accepts value and onChange props.
Dropdown select component for sorting cases using predefined sort options. Displays sort icon and triggers sort changes via callback.
Renders a list of checkboxes for surgery case checklist items. Allows toggling individual checklist items and can be disabled.
Provides buttons for exporting cases to CSV and importing cases from CSV files. Handles file parsing, validation, and creates/updates cases via mutations with error reporting.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: Date input component combining a native date input field with a calendar popover picker. Handles date parsing, validation, and synchronization between text input and calendar selection.
Exports surgery cases to CSV format and imports cases from CSV files with validation, error handling, and duplicate detection against existing cases.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the CSV column headers and TypeScript type for surgery case CSV import/export operations.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Parses structured text in label:value format to extract case information fields like MRN, pet name, species, dates, etc. into a CaseFormData object.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters surgery cases by searching across text fields, dates, species, sex labels, and checklist items using a case-insensitive query string.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Provides sorting functionality for surgery cases by arrival date (newest/oldest) or open task count (most/fewest) with secondary sorting by arrival date.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types and constants for species options, sex options, and the CaseFormData interface used in case forms.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation and parsing functions for case fields including medical record number, pet name, owner name, breed, species, sex, and dates with flexible format support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the backend actor with authentication, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: React hook that debounces a changing value with a configurable delay (default 500ms) to reduce frequent updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and auth client lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for managing surgery cases and user profiles, including queries for fetching cases and user data, and mutations for creating, updating, and deleting cases.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a light blue color scheme for the application, including specific colors for patient names and presenting complaints.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name composition.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters and session storage, supporting both regular query strings and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors using OKLCH color space, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document showing implemented sorting features for case cards by arrival date and open tasks, with persistence across user actions.
